text: @owenboswarva @EnvAgency They shouldn't be too ashamed. Been doing this professionally for years and it is is *very* hard to please the public. A) people don't understand risk, B) they don't like the truth, C) just give us the data

Apparently @EnvAgency has stopped publishing performance metrics for those services. (Hence the FOI.) #defradata #opendata #opengov

Publication of performance data is part of the GOVUK Service Standard. https://t.co/z9uSLHjhPu

EA has an explanation but it's rather lame.
